product_name: Salomon Agile Hydration Belt - 17 fl. oz.
long_description: For medium-to-long trail runs where you want to maintain agility, the stretch-fit Salomon Agile Hydration Belt moves with your body and provides easy access to soft-flask hydration and essentials. Sensifit belt with customizable length and Airvent Agility lumbar panel offer ventilated comfort. Zippered main compartment with internal pocket organizes small essentials. 17 oz. hydration flask with Blaster valve fits securely in a side mesh pocket. External elastic pocket is perfect for quick access to energy gels (sold separately). The Salomon Agile Hydration Belt features refelctive accents for enhanced visibility.
